code:
```verilog
[BEGIN]
module TopModule(
    input logic clk,
    input logic reset,
    output logic [2:0] ena,
    output logic [15:0] q
);

always @(posedge clk) begin
    if (reset) begin
        q <= 16'b0000_0000_0000_0000; // Reset the 4-digit BCD counter to zero
        ena <= 3'b000; // Reset enable signals
    end
    else begin
        // Increment ones digit
        if (q[3:0] == 4'd9) begin
            q[3:0] <= 4'b0000;
            ena[0] <= 1'b1; // Enable tens digit increment
        end
        else begin
            q[3:0] <= q[3:0] + 4'd1;
            ena[0] <= 1'b0;
        end

        // Increment tens digit
        if (ena[0]) begin
            if (q[7:4] == 4'd9) begin
                q[7:4] <= 4'b0000;
                ena[1] <= 1'b1; // Enable hundreds digit increment
            end
            else begin
                q[7:4] <= q[7:4] + 4'd1;
                ena[1] <= 1'b0;
            end
        end

        // Increment hundreds digit
        if (ena[1]) begin
            if (q[11:8] == 4'd9) begin
                q[11:8] <= 4'b0000;
                ena[2] <= 1'b1; // Enable thousands digit increment
            end
            else begin
                q[11:8] <= q[11:8] + 4'd1;
                ena[2] <= 1'b0;
            end
        end

        // Increment thousands digit
        if (ena[2]) begin
            if (q[15:12] == 4'd9) begin
                q[15:12] <= 4'b0000; // Roll over to 0
            end
            else begin
                q[15:12] <= q[15:12] + 4'd1;
            end
        end
    end
end

endmodule
[DONE]
```
